attributes.action: Free artist and art forger Shaun Greenhalgh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The art forger Shaun Greenhalgh was guilty of little more than creating compelling artefacts and making some museum 'experts' look less expert than they should be. His sentence of four years eight months (laid down in 2007) was unduly harsh, and he should be released as soon as possible.

rejection.details: Individual sentences are a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
